description:
Kevin is a 20-year-old college student. This Italian stud says that he likes sex a lot!
"Actually," he confessed, "me and my brothers are kind of players."
When asked to elaborate, he said, "We have competitions to see how many girls we can get."
So far, he's in second place!
The main rule: "All new," he said. "Can't have any repeats. They have to be completely new girls."
And where does he meet the girls? At his party school college of course!
I seriously doubt he has any trouble picking up on women. He's got a disarming smile and he's head to toe muscles.
And for all you pec lovers, he's got a nice set. Big slabs with perfect nipples and just the right amount of hair!
title: Kevin
